long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* IT ONLY MUTES WHEN AD SIDE BAR APPEARS

"Live Stream Ad Muter" is a Chrome extension crafted to enhance your live cricket streaming experience on Jiocinema.com. It smartly identifies and mutes tabs when advertisements appear during the intense IPL matches, allowing you to focus on the game without distraction. 

With sophisticated ad-detection technology, it ensures a seamless viewing pleasure, automatically unmuting when the live action resumes. Perfect for cricket enthusiasts who want uninterrupted enjoyment of every over without the intrusion of commercials. This extension is a game-changer for fans looking to savor every moment of the live cricket action.
